desc: Micro-roast coffee that is all organic and hand crafted to deliver the best possible flavor and aroma to help you through the day.

layout.text: Here at Diesel Fuel Coffee Co we value the hard working people of our country and they deserve a quality coffee that fuels them through the day. Our coffee is USDA approved, organic, micro-roasted, hand crafted with beans from all over the world. Our coffee has helped relieve headache and stomach pain caused by other less quality coffee brands.
